page.title: 05Media
page.content: Caernarfon is the main centre for the Independent Producers of Welsh Language Television Programmes for the Welsh Television Channel S4C.established in 1983.Teledu Tir Glas and Ffilmiau Nant have centres at Caernarfon.Barcud(programme production and equipment),Mwg(Lighting),Sling(set s),Gong(catering) are Caernarfon based. Barcud employs 23 full time and highly trained staff. The Caernarfon and Denbigh and Yr Herald Gymraeg were printed at Caernarfon until 1984 they are now printed at LLandudno Junction.Although the editorial office is still at Caernarfon. There are three publishers at Caernarfon,Pantycelyn,Gwynedd and Arfon.Siop y Pentan sells Welsh books.
